about.title: About NR-GEO
about.heading: Slovak Construction Intelligence
about.description: NR-GEO is a leading engineering surveying company specializing in underground construction, tunneling, and precision geodesy. With extensive experience of our team, we deliver world-class solutions for Europe's most demanding projects.
about.missionText: To provide precise, reliable geodetic support for critical infrastructure with emphasis on sustainable practices and European quality standards.
about.precisionExcellenceText: Precise surveying with certified geodetic equipment and licensed professionals according to project requirements.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions for modern underground construction
services.ctaTitle: Ready to modernize your infrastructure project?
services.ctaDescription: From traditional surveying to cutting-edge digital twins and sustainable supply chains - we deliver comprehensive solutions.

tunneling.title: Tunneling & Underground Surveying
tunneling.description: Specialized geodetic services for TBM operations, tunnel boring, and underground caverns with millimeter precision.
tunneling.overview: Specialized geodetic services for underground construction with millimeter precision. Over 20 years of experience in the most demanding tunnel projects across Europe.
capabilities: TBM (Tunnel Boring Machine) guidance and monitoring
tunneling.experience: 150+ km of tunnels surveyed across Scandinavia, Alps, and Balkans

scanToBim.title: Scaning 3D BIM Projection & Digital Twins
scanToBim.description: Cutting-edge laser scanning technology for material optimization and infrastructure lifecycle management.
scanToBim.overview: State-of-the-art 3D reality capture transformed into intelligent BIM models. Material optimization technology that reduces concrete usage by up to 15% through precise as-built modeling.
scanToBim.experience: Pioneering digital twins for Nordic infrastructure projects since 2024

geotechnical.title: Geotechnical Monitoring
geotechnical.description: Automated sensor systems for real-time stability monitoring, deformation warning systems, and risk analysis.
geotechnical.overview: Automated real-time monitoring systems for ground movement, structural stability, and safety-critical deformation analysis. 24/7 alert systems for early warning.
geotechnical.experience: Monitoring critical infrastructure across 12 European countries

cadastral.title: Cadastral Surveying
cadastral.description: Professional property surveys, boundary determination, and legal documentation for land management.
cadastral.overview: Professional cadastral surveying and land management services. Boundary determination, property surveys, and legal documentation for infrastructure and development projects.
cadastral.experience: Licensed surveyors with 20+ years serving Slovak and international projects

markets.title: Our Markets
markets.subtitle: Operating where Europe's future is being built
markets.globalDescription: NR-GEO delivers precision engineering worldwide - from Scandinavian megaprojects to Balkan Corridor VIII and Ukraine's reconstruction.
markets.globalFootnote: We work globally, no matter where your project is located

scandinavia.title: Scandinavia
scandinavia.description: Active projects in Sweden and Norway including major transport infrastructure.

balkans.title: Balkans - Corridor VIII
balkans.description: Strategic transit projects connecting Eastern and Western Europe.

ukraine.title: Ukraine - Reconstruction
ukraine.description: Partnership in rebuilding critical infrastructure with emphasis on sustainable materials.

worldwide.title: Worldwide Projects
worldwide.description: We accept projects globally - wherever precision engineering is needed, we deliver excellence.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet the experts behind our precision engineering

forbifart.title: Förbifart Stockholm
forbifart.description: 21 km Stockholm bypass - one of Europe's largest transport projects.
forbifart.overview: Förbifart Stockholm is one of Europe's largest infrastructure projects - a 21 km bypass route with 18 km of tunnel beneath the Swedish capital. NR-GEO provided comprehensive surveying and monitoring services throughout the entire construction phase.
scope: TBM guidance for 4 tunnel boring machines
Continuous deformation monitoring of existing infrastructure
Underground control network establishment and maintenance
achievements: Zero incidents related to surveying precision
Maintained millimeter accuracy over 21 km route
Successfully monitored 200+ buildings above tunnel route

brenner.title: Brenner Base Tunnel
brenner.description: The world's longest underground railway tunnel - 64 km.

railBaltica.title: Rail Baltica
railBaltica.description: Integrating Baltic states into the European railway network.

jarfalla.title: Järfällatunnel 4713
jarfalla.description: Critical section of Stockholm bypass requiring precision underground surveying.

tvr.title: TVR E05 Korsvägen
tvr.description: Advanced tunnel surveying for Gothenburg's major transport infrastructure project.

footer.description: Leading Slovak engineering surveying company specializing in underground construction and tunneling.
